description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. What is Paddle Baddle you ask? It may look like a simple paddle game but this ain't your grandmas paddle game. This is a Paddle Game on Steroids! (it's ok games can use steroids we checked)   Paddle Baddle offers 1 - 4 players 3 Fast paced game modes Obstacles and Power Ups 50+ Lvls  All wrapped up in a fast paced game where you can try dominate your friends to earn bragging rights.
